snippet: The number of Chinese adults with Type 2 diabetes has risen to 114 million — 11. 6 percent of the population, compared with below 1 percent in 1980.
abstract: Study in The Journal of the American Medical Association reports that China has surpassed the United States to claim world's highest rate of diabetes, with 11.6 percent of adults having the disease in comparison to 11.3 percent in America.
lead_paragraph: The number of Chinese adults with Type 2 diabetes has risen to 114 million — 11. 6 percent of the population, compared with below 1 percent in 1980.
